allTeamMembers.name: Landyn Sparacino
allTeamMembers.bio: Hi everyone! My name is Landyn Sparacino and I am a fourth year studying Cybersecurity and Criminal Justice. Once I graduate in May 2025, I will be joining Blackstone as a Cybersecurity Analyst. I have loved being a part of FirstByte and growing the club.

allTeamMembers.name: Caleb Lee
allTeamMembers.bio: Hi I'm Caleb, and I've had the pleasure of being involved with firstbyte for most of my college years. It's been such a rewarding experience to see this club grow and change, and It's come to be my second home. After I graduate, I'm heading to Chewy to work full time as a software engineer!

allTeamMembers.name: Win Tongtawee
allTeamMembers.role: CS Curricula Lead, React Team Lead, Brand & Marketing Lead
allTeamMembers.bio: Hello! I'm Win, I've had the honor of being a part of FirstByte when we only had 7 members. The club holds a special place in my heart and I'm looking forward to seeing what the future holds for FirstByte and its members. Currently Founding Engineer @ Delve, Founding Engineer @ Pagent, and publishing a paper on how we can use ML to predict depression.

previousRoles.role: CS Curricula Lead, Brand & Marketing Lead
CS Curricula Lead, React Team Lead, Brand & Marketing Lead

allTeamMembers.name: Cynthia Chen
allTeamMembers.bio: Hey everyone! I'm Cynthia, a graduating fourth year CS + Fintech student at Northeastern University. I've been enamored by technology since a young age, and I feel very privileged to be able to study and pursue my interests at university. I believe that computer science education and other STEM curricula should be accessible to everyone, and FirstByte is such a wonderful community that shares the same values. I hope students are able to learn and have fun through our hosted events! I'm also available to work starting summer of 2025, so please reach out if you're interested in connecting!

allTeamMembers.name: Alastaire Balin
allTeamMembers.bio: My name is Alastaire Balin and I am first-year studying CS and Business.

allTeamMembers.name: Shreesh Dassarkar
allTeamMembers.bio: Hi! I'm Shreesh and I'm a third year DS + Business major and I love playing basketball and fishing.

allTeamMembers.bio: Hey Everyone! My name is Shreyashi Kalakuntla and I am a second year studying Business Administration and Data Science with a concentration in finance.

allTeamMembers.bio: Hi everyone, I am Inesh and I am a second year Behavioral Neuroscience student with a minor in Data Science!

incomingEboard.name: Amoli Patel
incomingEboard.bio: Hi! I'm Amoli Patel, a combined Computer Science and Business Administration major. I first joined FirstByte because I enjoy helping others learn and was drawn to FirstByte's mission of making STEM education more accessible to all students. Ever since joining, I've enjoyed fruthering my own education while also meaningfully supporting others on their learning journey.
